title: BEAUTIFUL TOP FLOOR 2Br/2Ba CONDO/APARTMENT NEAR GREEN VALLEY DISTRICT
neighborhood: Henderson, 89052 off 215 and S Green Valley Pkwy on Horizon
map_address: 2291 Horizon Ridge Parkway near S. Green Valley Parkway
posting_body: ['Please contact Owner Viktoriya', 'show contact info', ') to ask any questions and schedule to see the property.', 'Available after August 1, 2022, not sooner.', 'Minimum lease until June 30, 2023 or multi year.', 'Move in is first month ($1,375), last month ($1,375) plus security ($1,375) = total $4,125, with good income and credit.', 'Will consider lower credit with higher security deposit.', 'NO PETS.', '- Zoned to Vanderburg and Twitchell Elementary and Coronado High Schools - some of the top public Elementary and High Schools in Henderson/Las Vegas', '- Gated Community (Gables), private and secure', '- 2 bedroom / 2 Bath 2nd Floor (which is top floor) 966 sq ft Condo/Apartment with a nice open floor plan', '- Beautiful Pool and Jacuzzi in the common area', '- 1 car port included plus plenty of additional guest parking', '- Nice newer Carpets throughout and tile in kitchen and bathrooms', '- Large Living Room and small Dining Area near kitchen', '- Master has bath and separate shower, closet, and additional storage space', '- Kitchen has updated cabinets.', 'All appliances included - Refrigerator, Stove, Dish Washer, Microwave, Washer, Dryer', '- Ceiling Fans with Lights in all the rooms and bedrooms', '- Separate Laundry Room with Washer/Dryer included', '- Open to individual, roommate(s) or family', 'School Zoning as per <URL>', '- Elementary:', 'Vanderburg or Twitchell ES - two of the top Elementary Schools in Nevada', '- Middle:', 'Bob Miller MS', '- High: Coronado HS - one of the best public high schools in Henderson/Vegas', 'Please contact Owner Viktoriya', 'show contact info', ') to ask any questions and schedule to see the property.', 'Available after August 1, 2022, not sooner.', 'Minimum lease until June 30, 2023 or multi year.', 'Move in is first month ($1,375), last month ($1,375) plus security ($1,375) = total $4,125, with good income and credit.', 'Will consider lower credit with higher security deposit.', 'NO PETS.']
